text: Kalash or Kalasha (also known as Kalasha-mun) is an Indo-European language in the Indo-Aryan branch, further classified as a Dardic language in the Chitral Group. However, this Dardic classification is questionable because only 53% of the commonly used words in Kalash have cognates in Khowar language. ==Related pages== * Languages of Pakistan ==References== Category:Kalash people Category:Dardic languages Category:Languages of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Endangered languages
title: Kalash language
